attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgrace when 44 year olds are essentially not punished for blinding 96 year olds. When those committing murder or assualt walk away almost scott free. It is time to get a grip and have proper punishment for crimes committed, not left leaning liberal codswallop.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
